title: Investigation Into Paris Attack Leads Authorities To Spain
teaser: In the wake of attacks in Paris, part of the investigation into terror cells in Europe has led to Spain. One of the Paris gunmen, Amedy Coulibaly, is believed to have visited Madrid in the days before he burst into a kosher market, killing four people.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
